insa.h4401.controller.states

Class SelectionsStates

  • java.lang.Object
    • insa.h4401.controller.states.DefaultState
      • insa.h4401.controller.states.SelectionsStates
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeliverySelectedState, EmptyNodeSelectedState, NothingSelectedState, WarehouseSelectedState

    public abstract class SelectionsStates
extends DefaultState
    This abstract class provides common code for logic states when a map and a planning are loaded.
    Author:
    Lisa, Estelle, Antoine, Pierre, Hugues, Guillaume, Paul
